form.title: New Test Run
form.description: Configure the parameters for your k6 load test, Lighthouse audit, and AI SEO analysis.
form.urlDescription: The full URL of the endpoint or page you want to test.
form.testSuitesDescription: Select one or more test suites to run against the target URL.
form.k6SwitchDescription: Simulate traffic to analyze performance under load.
form.lighthouseSwitchDescription: Audit for performance, accessibility, and SEO.
form.seoSwitchDescription: Use AI to analyze on-page SEO factors.

error.atLeastOne: Please select at least one test suite to run.

form.requestConfigDescription: Define the HTTP request details for the load test.
form.loadProfileDescription: Choose a preset or define a custom load profile for the k6 test.
form.customProfileDescription: Set fixed VUs/duration or define ramping stages.
form.stagesDescription: Define ramping stages for VUs over time.

toast.historyClearedDescription: Previous test history and recent URLs have been cleared.
toast.testStartedDescription: Your test suites are now running in the background.

clearHistoryDialog.title: Clear Previous History?
clearHistoryDialog.description: Running a new test can clear your previous test history. Would you like to clear it before starting this new test?

descriptions.custom: Define your own VUs and stages.

running.title: Test Running...
running.description: Please wait while the tests are being executed. This may take several minutes.

summary.title: Test Complete
summary.description: The test run for {{url}} has finished. See the summary below.
summary.noK6Data: No k6 load test data available for this run.
summary.noLighthouseData: No Lighthouse audit data available for this run.
summary.noSeoData: No SEO analysis data available for this run.

history.title: Test History
history.description: Review, re-run, or export your past test results.
history.noHistoryDescription: Run a new test from the home page to get started.

toast.exportSuccessDescription: Your test history has been saved as a JSON file.
toast.importSuccessDescription: Test history has been successfully imported.
toast.importFailDescription: Could not import the selected file.
toast.deleteSuccessDescription: The test run has been removed from your history.
toast.clearSuccessDescription: All test history has been deleted.

clearAllDialog.title: Are you sure you want to clear all history?
clearAllDialog.description: This will permanently delete all test records, including recent URLs. This action cannot be undone.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete this test?
deleteDialog.description: This action will permanently remove this test run from your history.

about.title: About K6 Commander
about.description: A lightweight, local-first, authorized load-testing and API development platform. It allows you to configure, run, and analyze load tests, Lighthouse audits, and SEO checks, as well as test APIs with a full-featured client—all from a sleek, responsive web UI.
about.localFirstDescription: Your test data and configurations never leave your machine. Everything is stored in your browser's LocalStorage.
about.unifiedToolingDescription: Combine load testing, web vitals audits, SEO checks, and API validation in a single, cohesive workflow.
about.k6FeatureDescription: Harness the power of Grafana k6 to simulate realistic traffic patterns and find performance bottlenecks before they hit production.
about.k6HowItWorks: This app spawns a k6 Docker container on your machine, configured with your settings. Metrics are streamed to a local InfluxDB instance.
about.k6HowItWorks2: A pre-configured Grafana dashboard connects to InfluxDB, providing a live view of your test's performance in real-time.
about.lighthouseFeatureDescription: Run Google Lighthouse audits directly from the UI to measure performance, accessibility, best practices, and SEO.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks: The backend runs Google Lighthouse using npx, simulating a user visit to generate a comprehensive report.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks2: Scores are summarized in the UI, and a link to the full, interactive HTML report is provided for deep analysis.
about.seoFeatureDescription: Leverage AI to perform a technical on-page SEO analysis, providing actionable recommendations for improvement.
about.seoHowItWorks: Your page's HTML is fetched and sent to a Google AI (Genkit) flow, which is prompted to act as an SEO expert.
about.seoHowItWorks2: The AI analyzes critical tags and elements, returning a structured report with status checks and improvement suggestions.
about.apiTesterFeatureDescription: A full-featured client to test any API endpoint, complete with history, collections, and cURL command support.
about.apiTesterHowItWorks: The API tester makes requests directly from your browser, showing you the exact response, headers, and performance metrics.
about.apiTesterHowItWorks2: Your request history is saved to LocalStorage, organized into collections for easy re-use and team collaboration via import/export.
about.stackDescription: Built with modern, powerful, and open-source technologies.
about.involvedDescription: K6 Commander is an open-source project. Contributions, bug reports, and feature requests are always welcome!

apiTester.newCollectionDescription: Enter a name for your new API request collection.

deleteCollectionDialog.title: Delete Collection?
deleteCollectionDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the '{{name}}' collection and all its requests? This cannot be undone.

deleteRequestDialog.title: Delete Request?
deleteRequestDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this request from your history? This action cannot be undone.

toast.cannotDeleteDefault: The default 'Scratch Pad' collection cannot be deleted.
toast.curlImportErrorDescription: Please paste a valid cURL command.
toast.curlImportSuccessDescription: The request has been populated from the cURL command.
toast.curlCopyErrorDescription: Could not generate or copy the cURL command.
toast.curlCopyInvalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL before copying as cURL.
toast.apiCurlCopiedDescription: The cURL command has been copied to your clipboard.
toast.jsonFormatErrorDescription: The text in the body is not valid JSON.

importCurlDialog.title: Import from cURL
importCurlDialog.description: Paste a cURL command here to automatically populate the request fields.

apiTester.noResponseYetDesc: Send a request to see the response here.

quickAccess.title: Command Center
quickAccess.description: Quickly navigate to any part of the application.
